name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The mother was scolded by the police at the police station because she did not do nucleic acid test in time due to illness. After her son interrupted, he was dragged into the women's restroom by the police and beaten.
The latest development of the case: The three police officers involved in the case were tried publicly. In court, the three people repeatedly testified and shirked each other. The prosecutor: It is recommended that the three be sentenced to 9 months in prison and suspended sentences.
Before the trial, Mr. Sun obtained 188,000 yuan in compensation from the defendant through civil litigation. "This part of the compensation is based on facts, but I can't ask me to issue a letter of understanding and let them go to work normally as if nothing happened. I think they should be punished for their actions."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a TCM expert said that many people say that Western medicine is mixed into Chinese medicine. In fact, Oseltamivir is also mixed with Chinese medicine star anise. It’s just that the West wants to save face, so they write shikimic acid in the ingredients.
A doctoral student in medicine at Southeast University said: Oseltamivir and shikimic acid are not the same thing at all. Shikimic acid is at most an intermediate in its synthesis path, and shikimic acid is not only found in star anise. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883914703384276992/pu/img/bmpExC1bkNuJBeHV.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Zhejiang, a delivery boy was suspected of not delivering food for a long time, and he collapsed and screamed. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883918066008088577/pu/img/AclKyukQzzWakreE.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens asked Deepseek "Are there dictators in the world?"
At first, Deepseek listed the dictators in various countries in the world, but when the answer came to China, the answer suddenly stopped. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1883922054300262400/pu/img/0mb9eGbFBfoF3Edz.jpg
